movie.title: Ingmar Bergman
movie.description_intro: About the early years of the 70's in Ingmar Bergman's professional and private life. "The Touch" (1971) and more.
movie.description_full: About the early years of the 70's in Ingmar Bergman's professional and private life. "The Touch" (1971) and more.

movies.title: Mr Blue Sky: The Story of Jeff Lynne & ELO
movies.title_english: Mr Blue Sky: The Story of Jeff Lynne & ELO
movies.title_long: Mr Blue Sky: The Story of Jeff Lynne & ELO (2012)
movies.summary: As the creative force behind Electric Light Orchestra and a singularly accomplished singer, songwriter, guitarist and producer, Jeff Lynne is one of rock's most iconic--yet mysterious--figures.
movies.description_full: As the creative force behind Electric Light Orchestra and a singularly accomplished singer, songwriter, guitarist and producer, Jeff Lynne is one of rock's most iconic--yet mysterious--figures.
movies.synopsis: As the creative force behind Electric Light Orchestra and a singularly accomplished singer, songwriter, guitarist and producer, Jeff Lynne is one of rock's most iconic--yet mysterious--figures.

movies.title: Prison Fighters: Five Rounds to Freedom
movies.title_english: Prison Fighters: Five Rounds to Freedom
movies.title_long: Prison Fighters: Five Rounds to Freedom (2017)
movies.summary: After seven years in a Thai prison, a former Muay Thai champion joins a controversial government program that allows inmates to fight for their freedom. A victory in his final fight will grant him a royal pardon and bring him one step closer to the son he left behind.
movies.description_full: After seven years in a Thai prison, a former Muay Thai champion joins a controversial government program that allows inmates to fight for their freedom. A victory in his final fight will grant him a royal pardon and bring him one step closer to the son he left behind.
movies.synopsis: After seven years in a Thai prison, a former Muay Thai champion joins a controversial government program that allows inmates to fight for their freedom. A victory in his final fight will grant him a royal pardon and bring him one step closer to the son he left behind.

movies.title: The Green Park
movies.summary: Holidays and holy days on the British Riviera. God save the Queen and Bubbah too!
movies.description_full: Holidays and holy days on the British Riviera. God save the Queen and Bubbah too!
movies.synopsis: Holidays and holy days on the British Riviera. God save the Queen and Bubbah too!

movies.title: When God Sleeps
movies.summary: This rap-punk-rock documentary tells the story of Iranian musician Shahin Najafi who is forced into hiding after hardline clerics issue a fatwa for his death, incensed by a rap song that focuses on the oppression of women and human rights abuses. Shahin's frantic escape leads to an impossible romance when he falls in love with the granddaughter of the first Prime Minister of the Islamic Republic of Iran. Their backgrounds make their relationship a modern-day Romeo and Juliet.

Their backgrounds make their relationship a modern-day Romeo and Juliet.
